name: pingdictate
description: get visual indication of average latency to host(s) in your menu bar

scripts.install: launchctl unload ~/Library/LaunchAgents/re.gitigno.pingdicate.plist || true && cp -r plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents/re.gitigno.pingdicate.plist && launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/re.gitigno.pingdicate.plist

author: Ant Cosentino <ant@io.co.za>
